feed.title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Tue Jun 25 2024 - Tue Jul 02 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of changes to BCD data
entry.content:
BCD Changes Report, Tue Jul 02 2024

Summary of BCD changes
from Tue Jun 25 2024 20:30:19 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue Jul 02 2024 10:05:40 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

Added Features: 15

Expand to see the full list

api

  1. Navigator ➞ registerProtocolHandler ➞ scheme_parameter_ethereum
  2. createImageBitmap ➞ options_imageOrientation_parameter ➞ from-image
  3. createImageBitmap ➞ options_imageOrientation_parameter ➞ none

html

  1. manifest ➞ display_override ➞ tabbed

http

  1. headers ➞ Priority

svg

  1. elements ➞ animate ➞ href
  2. elements ➞ animateMotion ➞ href
  3. elements ➞ animateTransform ➞ href
  4. elements ➞ image ➞ href
  5. elements ➞ linearGradient ➞ href
  6. elements ➞ mpath ➞ href
  7. elements ➞ script ➞ href
  8. elements ➞ set ➞ href

webextensions

  1. api ➞ contentScripts ➞ register ➞ matchOriginAsFallback
  2. api ➞ scripting ➞ RegisteredContentScript ➞ matchOriginAsFallback

Removed Features: 37

Expand to see the full list

api

  1. Navigator ➞ registerProtocolHandler ➞ scheme_parameter_etherium

html

  1. elements ➞ iframe ➞ external_protocol_urls_blocked
  2. elements ➞ track ➞ src ➞ settable_src

http

  1. status ➞ 100
  2. status ➞ 200
  3. status ➞ 201
  4. status ➞ 204
  5. status ➞ 206
  6. status ➞ 301
  7. status ➞ 302
  8. status ➞ 303
  9. status ➞ 304
  10. status ➞ 307
  11. status ➞ 401
  12. status ➞ 403
  13. status ➞ 404
  14. status ➞ 406
  15. status ➞ 407
  16. status ➞ 408
  17. status ➞ 409
  18. status ➞ 410
  19. status ➞ 412
  20. status ➞ 416
  21. status ➞ 418
  22. status ➞ 451
  23. status ➞ 500
  24. status ➞ 501
  25. status ➞ 502
  26. status ➞ 503
  27. status ➞ 504

svg

  1. global_attributes ➞ color-profile
  2. global_attributes ➞ enable-background
  3. global_attributes ➞ href
  4. global_attributes ➞ kerning
  5. global_attributes ➞ solid-color
  6. global_attributes ➞ solid-opacity
  7. global_attributes ➞ xml_base

Implementation Status Changes: +77, -0

Added (77)

api

  1. ResizeObserver ➞ observe ➞ options_box_parameter
    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. Navigator ➞ registerProtocolHandler ➞ scheme_parameter_ethereum
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. createImageBitmap ➞ options_imageOrientation_parameter ➞ from-image
    Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines

css

  1. properties ➞ text-transform ➞ math-auto
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. properties ➞ white-space-collapse ➞ break-spaces
    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. properties ➞ white-space-collapse ➞ collapse
    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. properties ➞ white-space-collapse ➞ preserve
    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  5. properties ➞ white-space-collapse ➞ preserve-breaks
    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines

html

  1. elements ➞ link ➞ rel ➞ dns-prefetch
    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. elements ➞ link ➞ rel ➞ manifest
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. manifest ➞ display_override ➞ tabbed
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

http

  1. headers ➞ Set-Cookie ➞ Partitioned
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. headers ➞ Priority
    Added to Firefox, Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
